io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.post

Interface PostEffect

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bloom, Blur, BrightnessEffect, ColorBoostEffect, ColorEffect, ColorEffectsShader, ContrastEffect, DynamicHeatShader, DynamicHeatShader2, EdgeResample, FastBlur, FragmentExpose, FXAA, GammaEffect, HeatShader, HeatShader2, HighPass, HueShiftEffect, LowExpose, MDRMap, MotionBlur, MultiEffect, NoiseEffect, NullPostProcessEffect, RotateEffect, SaturateShader, ScaleEffect, ShaderEffect, ThemeEffect, ToggledEffect, TransformEffect, VibranceEffect

    public interface PostEffect
    A class for managing graphical effects.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void dispose()
      Disposes of and destroys all resources used by this effect.
      void doPostProcess(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer container, org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame game, org.newdawn.slick.Image buffer, org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
      Run the effect.

    • Method Detail

      • doPostProcess

        void doPostProcess(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer container,
                   org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame game,
                   org.newdawn.slick.Image buffer,
                   org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Run the effect.
        Parameters:
        container - The container holding the game.
        game - The game.
        buffer - The screen buffer from the last render or from the last effect.
        g - The screen graphics object.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - If an error occurs rendering the effect.

      • dispose

        default void dispose()
              throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Disposes of and destroys all resources used by this effect.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - If an error occurs in the Slick2D library.
